Name: ARKSurvivalEvolved
Overview:
This Docker will download and install SteamCMD. It will also install ARK:SurvivalEvolved and run it (Normal server startup of ARK can take a long time!).

ATTENTION: First Startup can take very long since it downloads the gameserver files!

Update Notice: Simply restart the container if a newer version of the game is available.

You can also run multiple servers with only one SteamCMD directory!
DonateText: If you like my work please

@attributes.Name: GAME_ID
@attributes.Description:
The GAME_ID that the container download at startup.
If you want to install a static or beta version of the game change the value to: '376030 -beta YOURBRANCH' (without quotes, replace YOURBRANCH with the branch or version you want to install).

@attributes.Name: Steam-Username
@attributes.Description: Your Steam username goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

@attributes.Name: Validate Installation
@attributes.Description: Set the Variable to 'true' if you want to validate the installation otherwise leave it blank.

@attributes.Name: Steam-Password
@attributes.Description: Your Steam password goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

@attributes.Name: UDP 1
@attributes.Description: UDP Gameport (if you need another port, please delete this entry and create a new UDP Port with the required port number, also don't forget to click an 'Show more settings ...' and change the port number

@attributes.Name: Server Name
@attributes.Description: Leave empty if you want to use the settings from GameUserSettings.ini (this field accepts no spaces)

@attributes.Name: Server Password
@attributes.Description: Leave empty if you want to use the settings from GameUserSettings.ini (this field accepts no spaces)

@attributes.Name: Server Admin Password
@attributes.Description: Leave empty if you want to use the settings from GameUserSettings.ini (this field accepts no spaces)

@attributes.Name: Game Parameters
@attributes.Description: Enter your game parameters seperated with ? and start with a ? (don't put spaces in between eg: ?MaxPlayers=40?FastDecayUnsnappedCoreStructures=true)

@attributes.Name: Extra Game Parameters
@attributes.Description: Type in your Extra Game Parameters seperated with a space and - (eg: -DisableDeathSpectator -UseBattlEye)
